title: Calcaria
description: In a world that has forgotten the sound of its own heartbeat, in a city lost under the creak of gears and the hiss of steam; a darkness grows. Two worlds barely cling to life, and one reluctant stranger holds the power to tear them apart, or heal them. Join a confused demon, a brash alchemist, a stoic gardener and one seemingly unremarkable orange tomcat for a journey into a realm only limited by the reaches of the wildest of imaginations ... and faucet handles.
author: Puerdemon
